message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $14,000, which I think is a fair reflection of its value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I see the value in the product, $14,000 is a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to offer $13,000, and I believe that's a fair price considering both our perspectives.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not comfortable with the price of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a price of $14,500, which I think is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to you.

Alice, I understand you want to make a deal, and I'm happy to work with you. However, $14,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $13,500, which is a fair compromise considering the value of the product and my budget.  Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're making progress. However, I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $14,000, but I need you to meet me halfway on the last two hundred dollars. I'll sell the product to you for $14,200, and I think that's a fair price considering the value it brings to you.

Alice, I truly appreciate your willingness to negotiate, and I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.  While $14,200 is closer, it's still beyond my budget.  I'm prepared to offer $13,800, which is a fair compromise given the value of the product.  Let's reach a deal and make this happen!

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to reach a deal. I'll sell the product to you for $14,000, which is the same price I offered initially, but I'm willing to stick with it this time. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.

Alice, we've been going back and forth, and I appreciate your flexibility. I'm still committed to buying this product, but $14,000 is still a bit out of my reach. I'm willing to go up to $13,900, which is a fair compromise considering the value of the product and my budget. Let's close this deal and make this happen!

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad we're close to reaching an agreement. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $14,000. I'm willing to make a small concession, though - I'll sell the product to you for $13,950, which is just $50 more than your last offer. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
